metadata.name: Snowfall
metadata.description:
The first big snowfall of the year is a sight to see, like a big blanket of white setting the city to sleep. This animation was based on the old Harajuku station entrance before it was torn down in 2020.   

‘Snowfall’ is part of a larger series exploring small, everyday moments through light and colour. 

Created by instant_onion
Photoshop
360 frames, 24fps 
1920x1080px
